DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized study of conventional 3d radiation versus intensity-modulated radiation in squamous cell cancer of the head and neck.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Conventional 3D Radiation vs. Intensity-Modulated Radiation in Squamous Cell Cancer of the Head and Neck
DOC.criteria: histologically proven squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck or squamous cell cancer to the neck from an unknown head and neck primary site, stage IIV disease which is M0, age greater than 18 years, KPS greater than 70, signed studyspecific consent M1; bilateral N3 disease; primary greater than 10cm; salivary gland disease; life expectancy less than 2 years; prior radiotherapy to the head and neck; no signed studyspecific consent form
